original_text: Jesus went away from that place. While he walked, he saw a man called Matthew. Matthew's job was to take taxes from people. He was sitting in his office. Jesus said to him, ‘Come with me and be my disciple.’ So Matthew stood up and he went with Jesus.
korean_text: 예수께서 그 곳을 떠나 지나가시다가 마태라 하는 사람이 세관에 앉아 있는 것을 보시고 이르시되 나를 따르라 하시니 일어나 따르니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus went away from that place
he saw a man called Matthew
Matthew's job was to take taxes from people
sentences.korean_translation: 마태의 직업은 사람들에게 세금을 걷는 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: He was sitting in his office
'Come with me and be my disciple'
